𒇸 ≈ 𒐺𒌋𒊺𒌋 ≈ 𒐺𒆨• 𒊺 ≈ 𒐺𒆨•𒀹𒑋

𒇸 LIL lull (low wind)
𒇸 LIL fool
𒇸 líl n., wind; breath; infection; spirit (of a place); back or open country (reduplicated li, 'cedar scent' ?) [KID 𒆤? archaic frequency: 76; concatenates 5 sign variants].
v., to infect.

𒌑𒁀𒇸𒌅 šam-ba-lil-tu şembelîlk !!

𒇸 líl ≈ mal in
